definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Beijing new generation on Beijing modern sky music festival.
sentences.chinese: 北京摩登天空音樂節上的北京青年一代。

sentences.english: Actually, we live in a modern period.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們生活在一個摩登時代。

sentences.english: City Lights and Modern Times were of this kind.
sentences.chinese: “城市之光”和“摩登時代”就是這種影片。

sentences.english: The framework of the house is quite modern.
sentences.chinese: 這棟房子的構架很摩登。

sentences.english: What do "NCIS" and "Modern Family" have in common?
sentences.chinese: 《NCIS》和《摩登家庭》有什麼共通點嗎？

sentences.english: Modern Family won for overall cast performance in a TV comedy.
sentences.chinese: 《摩登家庭》的全體人員獲得了最佳喜劇表演獎。

sentences.english: Look at the show Modern Family.
sentences.chinese: 看看這個節目‘摩登家庭’。

sentences.english: The most bringive holiday- you would like to send or neteciing true blessing.
sentences.chinese: 這個最摩登的節日，想送你最異常的祝願。

sentences.english: Modern business card designed to look like a Twitter profile page. [link]
sentences.chinese: 這張摩登的名片看起來就是一份推客個人資料。

sentences.english: Dorade is considered the very first modern yacht.
sentences.chinese: 多拉達號是最早出現的摩登帆船。

sentences.english: And he also sent a modern car.
sentences.chinese: 他也送來了一輛摩登的汽車。

sentences.english: Drawing the beautiful horses took me three years.
sentences.chinese: 畫這些摩登的馬花消了我三年時間。

sentences.english: Flintstone, but I can make your Bedrock.
While climask the mountain- we enjoyed the wset sunshine and a great view .
sentences.chinese: 在爬山時，我們享用着溫和的陽光和摩登的得意。

sentences.english: Modern concept cars and beautiful car designs from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 來自世界各地的摩登概念車及帥氣的汽車設計理念。

sentences.english: Modern Time by Chaplin is a silent film.
sentences.chinese: 卓別林演的《摩登時代》是一部無聲影片。

definition: to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
to mix and match (of clothing etc)
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
